name: Uterine Arteriovenous Malformation (AVM) with Secondary Hemorrhage
chief_complaint: I have heavy vaginal bleeding that won't stop, and I feel very dizzy
prognosis: Guarded - high risk of life-threatening hemorrhage without prompt intervention; good outcomes with timely embolization
description: A rare vascular anomaly where abnormal connections form between uterine arteries and veins, often causing torrential bleeding. May be congenital or acquired (post-D&C, C-section, or gestational trophoblastic disease). This case presents with acute hemorrhage requiring urgent intervention.
multiple_choice: Uterine Arteriovenous Malformation (AVM) with Secondary Hemorrhage
